programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Lead sleds are universally cool, and buying someone else's project can be full of surprises. Join Alex and Lucky as they uncover all the quirks and shortcuts the previous owner took in their quest to revive one of the coolest styles of all time.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: We may have lost the shop, but we're putting that lease money to good use with an all-new '72 Nova project. This one has two goals: be fast at the track and be civil on the streets.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
